section.name: Subprojects
section.p: Aside the development of the main OpenEngSB infrastructure a number of subprojects were spawned. These projects focus on tailoring OpenEngSB to solve typical integration issues in a specific scenario.

div.div:
OpenCIT
Efficient continuous integration server. Well-integrated into the service bus environment and used by the OpenEngSB family of projects.

OpenTicket
Generic issue tracker for engineering processes. Light-weight ticket management integrated into OpenEngSB infrastructure. Proof of concept and valuable reference for new integration efforts.

YASTE
Frontend for automated testing environment for software development processes. Configuration and provisioning of virtual machines for running system- and acceptance-tests.
